success.TRANSLATIONS_ADDED: Title translated to your languages. Feel free to check & adjust the aliases.
success.No_TRANSLATIONS_ADDED: Title already available in all your languages.

errors.NOT_A_FILE: Cannot translate the title of nothing, because nothing doesn't have anything, notably no title.

translation_errors.AUTH_BAD_KEY: Title not translated! ‚ùå Check your API key, it seems not valid üîë
translation_errors.AUTH_PROBLEM: Title not translated! ‚ùå Authentication problem, check your API key üëæ

settings.TARGET_LANGS_FIELD_DESC: Note titles will be translated to these languages and added to aliases, so that you can link/reference notes in all your languages. (e.g.: "fr, it")
settings.AUTO_TRANSLATE_TOGGLE_DESC: Whether to automatically translate the title every time you create or rename a note. (You can always trigger manual translation via command or right-click menu.)
settings.TRANSLATOR_SELECTOR_DESC: Google Translate is widely used and supports more languages, DeepL is great and easier to set up.
settings.API_KEY_FIELD_DESC: Create a ${translator} API key and paste it here. This is mandatory for the plugin to work. (The API key is stored in the Obsidian config files in your Obsidian valut location.)
settings.IGNORE_DATE_FORMAT_FIELD_DESC: Titles matching this date format won't be auto-translated. Can be useful for for daily notes. Default: YYYY-MM-DD.
settings.IGNORE_REGEX_FIELD_DESC: Titles matching this custom regex won't be auto-translated.
settings.IGNORE_PATH_FIELD_DESC: Titles of notes in this folder and its subfolders won't be auto-translated.
settings.ADD_ORIGINAL_TITLE_DESC: This can make inserting links/references faster for languages with declensions (like German, Russian, Latin (oh my), etc.)
